page.title: 10Sudbury Snooker Club
page.content: Snooker, during the last two years has become very popular. Two new snooker clubs have been built in Sudbury,and we visited one. Sudbury Snooker Club is owned by Mr.and Mrs.Baldwin. There are 10 snooker tables and a bar. The system is run by computers. They charge 3p a minute or 1.80 pounds an hour. But most people play for 1-2 hours. The member- ship fees are: 10 pounds for 1 person, 12 pounds for husband and wife 2 pounds for spectators. The opening times are 10:00am - 11:30pm They open every day except for Chrismas Day. The busiest times are the evenings and the Winter. They have competitions between members and other clubs. The tables at the club cost between 1000-2000 pounds. By Helen Everitt and Ann Bailey.
